name: Veggie-Peck
description:
During these strange times, demand for vegetables has gone through the roof and poor little Arti is rushed off his feet. Help him memorize orders and get them out to the other birds, but try not to make any mistakes. Arti's a sensitive soul... 

CONTROLS:

Left click or tap on the veggies in the correct order to make the birds happy.

Mess up, and you'll get onions and garlics, and everyone hates those... right?

**NOTE** 

The "Hurry Up!" text and some music fades don't function properly in Firefox.
